value.name: Mediator Profile: S.Glenn Sigurdson
value.description: Let’s start with a new medium.” So pleased were the Cree by the outcome that they awarded Sigurdson, McCaffrey and their colleagues Colin Gillespie and Emmett Hall (a former judge of Canada’s supreme court) with eagle feathers, a very high accolade.
